ui.eg_bedrock_books.lectern.bookmark_too: The bookmarked page is the one other players will see, and the one lecterns will use for redstone output
ui.eg_bedrock_books.config.title: Bedrock Books Config
ui.eg_bedrock_books.config.reset.title: Reset the config?
ui.eg_bedrock_books.config.reset.warning: This action CANNOT be undone, all Bedrock Books config options will be reset to their default values
ui.eg_bedrock_books.config.option.close_: Should the current book screen be closed when clicking a piece of text in the book that will run a command? Enable this for vanilla behaviour
ui.eg_bedrock_books.config.key.open_vani: If enabled, holding down this key and opening a book screen will show the vanilla screen instead of Bedrock Book's custom screen
